synopsis.text: Stuck in a perpetual cycle of unsuccessful job interviews and a chaotic family life, Juri Yukawa finds herself in a dire situation when her brother and nephew are kidnapped, with an exorbitant ransom demanded for their safe return. As the clock ticks down, Juri's grandfather reveals a closely guarded family secret: a mystical stone that can halt time. Together with her father and grandfather, Juri plunges into a frozen world, racing against unseen adversaries who also possess the ability to navigate this temporal stasis. Amidst the chaos, they encounter a colossal, enigmatic entity known as the Herald, further complicating their rescue mission. Will Juri and her family outmaneuver their foes and return to their normal lives, or will they remain trapped in this timeless realm forever?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
